product_name: Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps Twin Pack - 21 ft.
long_description: The 21 ft. Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps are a great choice for tying down kayaks, canoes, luggage and other large items on top of your car. 1 in. heavy-duty webbing features extra-strength stitiching. Galvanized buckle features a buckle protector to prevent scratches; buckle protector can be slid on or off. Center-spring mounted cams offer a strong, secure grip. Includes two 21 ft. straps.
short_description: The 21 ft. Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps are a great choice for tying down kayaks, canoes, luggage and other large items on top of your car.
